name: From the Dark...
description:
From the dark emerges a cursed game, and a cursed enemy....

STORY:

 December 17, 198X, you purchase a game from a sketchy game shop. That night, you have a dream of the cartridge being destroyed and the words: "WELCOME TO THE GAME OF LIFE AND DEATH." You ignore this pointless nightmare and begin playing...

WASD to move. Collect all of the keys and get to  the door to advance. There are 3 levels.

Contains an original soundtrack.
